title: Earth: An Intimate History - Richard Fortey for Kindle
description:
Earth: An Intimate History
by Richard Fortey  for Kindle

Language : English

ISBN-13: 978-0375706202

ISBN-10: 0375706208




In Earth, the acclaimed author of Trilobite! and Life takes us on a grand tour of the earthÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s physical past, showing how the history of plate tectonics is etched in the landscape around us.

 

Beginning with Mt. Vesuvius, whose eruption in Roman times helped spark the science of geology, and ending in a lab in the West of England where mathematical models and lab experiments replace direct observation, Richard Fortey tells us what the present says about ancient geologic processes. He shows how plate tectonics came to rule the geophysical landscape and how the evidence is written in the hills and in the stones. And in the process, he takes us on a wonderful journey around the globe to visit some of the most fascinating and intriguing spots on the planet
